includeHasher.description: Should the boilerplate for a custom hasher be generated?

nameAndDirectoryFormat.description: Whether to generate the executor in the directory as provided, relative to the current working directory and ignoring the project (`as-provided`) or generate it using the project and directory relative to the workspace root (`derived`).
